text: was a Japanese economist and professor emeritus of Hitotsubashi University. He graduated from Hitotsubashi University in 1966. His research interests were in social choice theory and welfare economics. He was also a Fellow of the Econometric Society.Fellows of the Econometric Society He was born in Tokoname, Aichi, Japan. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Japanese scientists Category:Japanese economists
title: Kotaro Suzumura
